step_data.thought: I've clicked on the System menu and it's expanded now. I need to look for an option related to Login as Customer Logs or something similar. Looking at the expanded menu, I can see several sections including 'Data Transfer', 'Extensions', 'Tools', 'Permissions', 'Action Logs', and 'Other Settings'. The 'Action Logs' section seems most relevant for reviewing login or customer impersonation activity. Let me check if there's an option for Login as Customer Log or something similar under Action Logs.
